languages.text: Молниеносный удар поразил Вольного Торговца прежде, чем {mf|тот|та} успел{mf||а} что-либо предпринять. Без чувств Лорд-капитан повалил{mf|ся|ась} в снег, и лишь вмешательство блюстителей, бесстрашно бросившихся на защиту свое{mf|го|й} повелител{mf|я|ьницы}, заставила жуткого недруга ретироваться.

A bolt of lightning strikes the Rogue Trader before {mf|he|she} can act to avoid it. The Lord Captain collapses insensate in the snow, and only the intervention of the enforcers, who rush fearlessly to the defence of their {mf|lord|lady}, force the malevolent foe to retreat.
languages.original_text: Молниеносный удар поразил Вольного Торговца прежде, чем {mf|тот|та} успел{mf||а} что-либо предпринять. Без чувств Лорд-капитан повалил{mf|ся|ась} в снег, и лишь вмешательство блюстителей, бесстрашно бросившихся на защиту свое{mf|го|й} повелител{mf|я|ьницы}, заставила жуткого недруга ретироваться.

traits.locale_text: A bolt of lightning strikes the Rogue Trader before {mf|he|she} can act to avoid it. The Lord Captain collapses insensate in the snow, and only the intervention of the enforcers, who rush fearlessly to the defence of their {mf|lord|lady}, force the malevolent foe to retreat.

A bolt of lightning strikes the Rogue Trader before {mf|he|she} can act to avoid it. The Lord Captain collapses insensate in the snow, and only the intervention of the enforcers, who rush fearlessly to the defence of their {mf|lord|lady}, force the malevolent foe to retreat.

A bolt of lightning strikes the Rogue Trader before {mf|he|she} can act to avoid it. The Lord Captain collapses insensate in the snow, and only the intervention of the enforcers, who rush fearlessly to the defence of their {mf|lord|lady}, force the malevolent foe to retreat.

A bolt of lightning strikes the Rogue Trader before {mf|he|she} can act to avoid it. The Lord Captain collapses insensate in the snow, and only the intervention of the enforcers, who rush fearlessly to the defence of their {mf|lord|lady}, force the malevolent foe to retreat.

languages.text: 行商浪人还没来得及躲避，就被一记宛如闪电般的攻击击中了。{mf|他|她}失去了知觉，倒在雪地之中。士兵们勇敢地冲了上去，保护他们的舰长，最终逼退了邪恶的敌人。
languages.original_text: A bolt of lightning strikes the Rogue Trader before {mf|he|she} can act to avoid it. The Lord Captain collapses insensate in the snow, and only the intervention of the enforcers, who rush fearlessly to the defence of their {mf|lord|lady}, force the malevolent foe to retreat.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人还没来得及躲避，就被一记宛如闪电般的攻击击中了。{mf|他|她}失去了知觉，倒在雪地之中。士兵们勇敢地冲了上去，保护他们的舰长，最终逼退了邪恶的敌人。

languages.text: 自由開拓者が回避行動をとる前に、稲妻がその身を襲う。ロード・キャプテンは雪の中で意識を失い倒れ込む。エンフォーサーは己の主君を守ろうと、恐れずにロード・キャプテンへと駆け寄って邪悪な敵を退却させるのが精一杯だ。
languages.original_text: A bolt of lightning strikes the Rogue Trader before {mf|he|she} can act to avoid it. The Lord Captain collapses insensate in the snow, and only the intervention of the enforcers, who rush fearlessly to the defence of their {mf|lord|lady}, force the malevolent foe to retreat.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者が回避行動をとる前に、稲妻がその身を襲う。ロード・キャプテンは雪の中で意識を失い倒れ込む。エンフォーサーは己の主君を守ろうと、恐れずにロード・キャプテンへと駆け寄って邪悪な敵を退却させるのが精一杯だ。

languages.text: Un rayo cae sobre {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente antes de que pudiera intentar siquiera evitarlo. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán se desploma inconsciente en la nieve y únicamente la intervención del personal de seguridad, que se precipita sin miedo en defensa de su {mf|lord|lady}, obliga al zafio enemigo a retirarse.
languages.original_text: A bolt of lightning strikes the Rogue Trader before {mf|he|she} can act to avoid it. The Lord Captain collapses insensate in the snow, and only the intervention of the enforcers, who rush fearlessly to the defence of their {mf|lord|lady}, force the malevolent foe to retreat.

traits.locale_text: Un rayo cae sobre {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente antes de que pudiera intentar siquiera evitarlo. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán se desploma inconsciente en la nieve y únicamente la intervención del personal de seguridad, que se precipita sin miedo en defensa de su {mf|lord|lady}, obliga al zafio enemigo a retirarse.

languages.text: Un éclair frappe {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} avant qu'{mf|il|elle} ne puisse faire quoi que ce soit pour l'éviter. {mf|Il|Elle} perd alors connaissance et s'effondre dans la neige. Seule l'intervention des prévôts, qui se précipitent courageusement au secours de leur chef, force l'être malveillant à reculer.
languages.original_text: A bolt of lightning strikes the Rogue Trader before {mf|he|she} can act to avoid it. The Lord Captain collapses insensate in the snow, and only the intervention of the enforcers, who rush fearlessly to the defence of their {mf|lord|lady}, force the malevolent foe to retreat.

traits.locale_text: Un éclair frappe {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} avant qu'{mf|il|elle} ne puisse faire quoi que ce soit pour l'éviter. {mf|Il|Elle} perd alors connaissance et s'effondre dans la neige. Seule l'intervention des prévôts, qui se précipitent courageusement au secours de leur chef, force l'être malveillant à reculer.

languages.text: Ein Blitz trifft {mf|den Freihändler, bevor er|die Freihändlerin, bevor sie} ausweichen kann. Der Lord Captain bricht leblos im Schnee zusammen, und nur das Eingreifen der Enforcers, die furchtlos {mf|ihrem Lord|ihrer Lady} zu Hilfe eilen zwingt den bösartigen Gegner zum Rückzug.
languages.original_text: A bolt of lightning strikes the Rogue Trader before {mf|he|she} can act to avoid it. The Lord Captain collapses insensate in the snow, and only the intervention of the enforcers, who rush fearlessly to the defence of their {mf|lord|lady}, force the malevolent foe to retreat.

traits.locale_text: Ein Blitz trifft {mf|den Freihändler, bevor er|die Freihändlerin, bevor sie} ausweichen kann. Der Lord Captain bricht leblos im Schnee zusammen, und nur das Eingreifen der Enforcers, die furchtlos {mf|ihrem Lord|ihrer Lady} zu Hilfe eilen zwingt den bösartigen Gegner zum Rückzug.

languages.text: Hür Tacir hamle yapamadan üzerine yıldırım düşüyor. Lord Kaptan, bilinçsiz hâlde karın üzerine yığılıyor. {mf|Lordunu|Leydisini} korumak için korkusuzca koşan infazcıların tek yapabildiği, kötücül düşmanı geri çekilmeye zorlamak oluyor.
languages.original_text: A bolt of lightning strikes the Rogue Trader before {mf|he|she} can act to avoid it. The Lord Captain collapses insensate in the snow, and only the intervention of the enforcers, who rush fearlessly to the defence of their {mf|lord|lady}, force the malevolent foe to retreat.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir hamle yapamadan bir yıldırım üzerine düştü. Lord Kaptan, bilinçsiz bir şekilde karın üzerine yığıldı ve {mf|lordunu|leydisini} korumak için korkusuzca koşan infazcıların tek yapabildiği şey, kötücül düşmanı geri çekilmeye zorlamaktı.
